title: Troubleshooting Valve Issues Using The Armada Pro50

tasks.task: Troubleshoot a malfunctioning irrigation zone on a sprinkler system.
subtasks: Determine if the issue is caused by a valve or controller problem.

tasks.task: Test and diagnose the controller and wiring for a zone that is coming on partially.
subtasks: Use a solenoid activator (e.g., Pro 50 Activator Chatterer) or multimeter to check for voltage and resistance.

tasks.task: Diagnose a zone that isn't coming on at all.
subtasks: Verify the zone's programming and module insertion in modular controllers.
